name: KaijuJam 2 - Card game
description:
This is just a prototype, made it in one week on Godot 3.5 for the Kaiju-Jam 2.

This is the first card game I ever made, and it was very interesting because the mechanics are way different from other usual games like platformers.

Maybe in the future I could add it more mechanics and details but for now is only to learning proposes.
